It's a virus that enters your body throu:
Ke vaerase e kenang mmeleng wa hao ka madi / mekedikedi ya mmele. 
E hlasela disele tsa hao tsa CD4 tse sireletsang mmele wa hao kgahlanong le mafu.
What does HIV do to my body?. \nHIV ente:
HIV e etsang mmeleng wa ka? 
HIV e kena mmeleng wa hao le ho ikatisa. E hlasela masole a hao hore o se kgone ho lwantsha ditshwaetso.
Is there a cure?\nThere is currently no:
Na pheko e teng?
Ha ho pheko bakeng sa HIV hajwale. Empa ho nwa di-ARV kamehla ho ka o boloka o phetse.
What is viral load?\nViral load is the a:
Loutu ya vaerase ke eng?
Loutu ya vaerase ke bongata ba vaerase e mading a hao. Ha loutu ya vaerase ya hao e phahame, o kula haholo.
What is low viral load?\nA low viral loa:
Loutu ya vaerase e tlase keng?
Loutu e tlase ke baka la ho sebedisa kalafo kamehla.
Qetellong loutu ya vaerase e tla ba tlase hoo e sa fumaneheng.
What is your current age?\nSelect your a:
Dilemo tsa hao hajwale ke dife?  
Kgetha sehlopha sa dilemo:
When were you first diagnosed positive?: O fumane neng ho re o HIV+?
MenConnect sends you messages to help wi:
MenConnect eo romela melaetsa e o thusang ka kalafo ya hao.
Ho bonahala o sa hloke kalafo. Haeba o romela karabo e fosahetseng, daela *134*406# ho qala botjha.
Are you or have you been on ARV treatmen: Na o bile kapa o kalafong ya ARV?
Are you still taking your treatment?: Na o bile kapa o kalafong ya ARV?
Is your viral load undetectable?: Na loutu ya hao ya vaerase ha e fumanehe?
Taking your meds daily stops HIV from ma: Ho nwa meriana kamehla ho thibela HIV ho ikatisa mading a hao hore disele tsa hao tsa CD4 di be matla hape.
Take your meds every day, at the same ti: Enwa meriana ya hao kamehla, ka nako e tshwanang, jwalo ka ha o hlaloseditswe ke mooki.
You need to take your meds every day for: O hloka ho nwa meriana ya hao kamehla bophelo bohle ba hao ho dula o le matla o phetse hantle.
Every person feels different after takin: Motho e mong le e mong o ikutlwa ka tsela e fapaneng kamora meriana. Ha o sa ikutlwe hantle, bua le mooki.
It is important that you take the meds t: Ho bohlokwa ho nwa meriana ya hao ka moo o laetsweng ke mooki.
You can still take the meds within 6 hrs: O ka sebedisa meriana horeng tse 6 kamora nako ya tlwaelo. Se ka pheta tekanyetso kamoso haeba o tlotse letsatsi.
We process your info to help you on your: Re sebetsa lesedi ho o thusa leetong la bophelo. Re bokella lebitso, dilemo, nomoro ya sele, puo, kanale, boemo, matsatsi a tleliniki, le dipotso.
We use your personal info to send you me: Re sebedisa lesedi la botho ho o romela melaetsa e lokelang mohato wa leeto la bophelo bo botle. Lesedi le thusa sehlopha ho ntlafatsa tshebeletso.
Your data is protected. It's processed b: Lesedi la hao le sireleditswe. Le sebetswa ke MTN, Cell C, Telkom, Vodacom, Praekelt, Genesis, Jembi, Turn, WhatsApp le balekane
We hold your info while you're registere: Re tshwara lesedi la hao ha o ngodisitswe. Ha o tswa, re tla sebedisa lesedi la hao ka mabaka a nalane, patlisiso le dipalopalo ka tumello ya hao.
What is low viral load?: Loutu ya vaerase e tlase keng?
How long to take it?: Ke e nwa nako e kae?
Show my next expected clinic date: Bontsha letsatsi le latelang la tleliniki
Plan for my clinic visit: Rerela ketelo ya ka ya tlelliniki
Based on what you told me, I think your: Ho latela seo o ntjwetsang, ke nahana ketelo e latelang ebe {{next_clinic_visit}}
Change your next clinic date: Fetola letsatsi la hau le latelang la tleliniki
Sorry, I don’t recognise that date. Plea: Uxolo, angiluboni lolo suku. Ngicela bohlokoa hape.
Hmm, that seems a bit far away. You shou: Hmm, hoo ho bonahala ho le hole haholo. U lokela hore bonyane u ee tleleniking likhoeli tse ling le tse ling tse 2. Ka kopo leka hape.
Oops, that day has already passed. Pleas: Oops, letsatsi leo le se le fetile. Ka kopo leka hape.
You entered {{clinic_date}}. I'll send y: U kentse {{clinic_date}}. Ke tla u romella likhopotso tsa se tlang ho etela tleliniking hore o se lebale.
Your next clinic visit has been changed: Ketelo ea hau e latelang ea tleliniki e fetotsoe ho {{clinic_date}}

Okay. I'll send you MenConnect messages: Ke tla o romela melaetsa ya MenConnect ho {{channel}} ho tloha jwale. Ho ya morao ho SMS, araba SMS kapa eya ho MENYU ho fetola dintlha tsa hao.
Thanks, I'll call you {{preferred_name}}:

Sorry, the cell number you entered alrea: Ke maswabi, nomoro ya sele eo o e kentseng e se ntse e le teng e fumana melaetsa ya MenConnect. Ho e laola, sheba MENYU ho tswa nomorong eo.

Who can see my info?: Ke mang ya bonang sedi laka?
How long is my info kept?: Sedi le bolokwa nako e kae?
Adcock Ingram Depression and Anxiety Hel: Mohala wa Adcock Ingram wa Tetebelo Maikutlong le Tshabo o ka o thusa haeba o ikutlwa o tetebetse maikutlo.
The South African Depression and Anxiety: Sehlopha sa South African Depression and Anxiety se o tshehetsa ha o wele moya. Daela 0800 4567 789 bakeng sa mohala wa bona dihora tse 24.
Sehlopha sa South African Depression and Anxiety se o tshehetsa ha o wele moya. Daela 0800 4567 789 bakeng sa mohala wa thuso wa ho se ipolaye.
Anonymous & confidential info, counselli: Lesedi le sa faneng mabitso la sephiri, dikeletso le diphetiso ho diphofu, dipaki le bahlohleletsi ba dikgoka tsa bong. Daela 0800 150 150.
The Substance Abuse Line offers support: Mohala wa Tshebediso-Mpe ya Dithethefatsi o tshehetsa le ho tataisa makgoba a tahi le dithethefatsi le malapa. Daela 0800 12 13 14 kapa SMS ho 32312
The National HIV and AIDs Helpline is a: Mohala wa National HIV and AIDS o letsetswa mahala ho fumana dikeletso tsa sephiri ntle le mabitso. Letsetsa 0800 012 322 o thuswe dihora tse 24.
For correct & up to date info on COVID-1: Bakeng sa lesedi le kgemang le dinako ka COVID-19, boloka nomoro ya +2760 0123 456 mme o romele 'hi' kapa letsetsa mohala wa naha wa COVID-19 ho 0800 029 999
MenConnect needs to process your persona: Sisebenzisa ulwazi lwakho ukukuthumelela imiyalezo ehambisana nesigaba sohambo lwakho lwezempilo. Ulwazi lwakho lusiza ithimba lithuthukise isevisi.
Sorry, please reply with the number next: Uxolo, ngicela uphendule ngenombolo eseduze kwempendulo yakho. Ingabe uyavuma?
